about_the_game:
My Burning Heart is an erotic Visual Novel, for 18+ only, with homosexual explicit content, set in an Arabian Nights world.

Our protagonist, Adnan, gets sold as a slave and, instead of being sent to work in the fields, as he expected, he ends up in a Sultan’s harem… Although they try to trick him with good words and promises of being well-fed and no physical punishments, he decides to comply with the Sultan’s orders… but only while he plans his escape from the palace.

Features:


- 65k words (around 5 hours of gameplay).

- Two routes, each one with a good and a bad ending, plus an additional good end with the villain (100% consensual!)

- 13 stunning CGs with variations (most of them +18 rated).

- Detailed adult scenes.

- Telltales on each choice to help you get your chosen route.

- Free demo released for Yaoi Jam 2018.

- Full English voice acting.

- Steam Achievements.

- Text available in English, Spanish and German.


COMING SOON:

- French translation.

- Steam Trading Cards.

- After stories.

Team:


-Ertal, developer, writer and PR.

-6nii9, main artist.


Disclaimer:
Despite what the early characters' descriptions might say, ALL THE CHARACTERS ARE ABOVE 18 YEARS OLD

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains explicit depiction of sexual activities between two men, both in illustrations and in text descriptions.

Trigger warning for dub-con, and also for non-con in one of the bad endings (which can be easily avoided).

reviews:
“All in all this is a very interesting and captivating anime visual novel. The characters are very different and have their own traits.”
IFGN

“I don't usually review yaoi games, but this one is worth the spotlight. Gorgeous artwork, hot love stories, beautiful writing, and seductive characters - all in one package! Easy to fall in love with.”
Casual Game Reviews

“Me gustaría hablaros más del carácter arisco de Adnan, lo amable y dulce que es Halim, lo paciente y atento que es Abd Al-Rashid (sobretodo para ser un sultán), y lo retorcido que es Harun, pero no quiero haceros spoiler y me gustaría que conocierais de primera mano sus experiencias. Las historias son cortas, apenas unas horas, pero te da tiempo a acercarte a los personajes, apreciarlos y ponerte colorada mil y una vez con cada momento de sexo íntimo narrado y dibujado con tanto detalle.”
Todasgamers
